table.t-attf-class: table table-sm text-muted {{'' if single_value_attributes else 'd-none'}}

div.class: d-flex justify-content-between flex-column flex-md-row align-items-md-end mb-3

div.data-editor-message: DROP BUILDING BLOCKS HERE TO MAKE THEM AVAILABLE ACROSS ALL PRODUCTS

div.p: Embodying the row ,wayward spirit of rock 'n' roll,the kill burn portable active stereo speaker takes the unmistakable look and sound of Marshall ,unplugs the codes 'and takes the show on the road.

Waiting in under seven pounds the kill burn is  a light piece of vintage styled engineering. Setting the bar as one of the loudest speakers in its class,The kill burn us a compact , stout-hearted  hero with a well-balanced audio which boost a clear mid range and extended highs for a sound that is both articulate and pronounced . The analog knobs allow you to fine turn the controls to you  are personal preferences while the guitar-influenced leather strop enable easy and stylish travel ​ ​

section.class: s_dynamic_snippet_products s_dynamic pt32 pb32 o_colored_level s_product_product_borderless_1 o_dynamic_empty

div.class: missing_option_warning alert alert-info rounded-0 fade show d-none d-print-none o_default_snippet_text

section.class: s_cover parallax s_parallax_is_fixed bg-black-50 pt96 pb96 o_colored_level

t.p: Your previous cart has already been completed.

Click here
if you want to restore your previous cart. Your current cart will be replaced with your previous cart.

Click here
if you want to merge your previous cart into current cart.
